fact.description: The match is underway in Porto Alegre.
Throw-in Algeria.
Germany awarded a free kick in their own half.
Germany drive forward but Shkodran Mustafi is judged offside.
Germany to take a throw-in in Algeria territory.
Sandro Meira Ricci signals a Algeria throw-in in Germany's half.
Free kick Germany.
Goal kick for Algeria at Estadio Beira-Rio.
Sandro Meira Ricci signals a free kick to Germany in their own half.
Algeria's El Arabi Soudani gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Germany defender.
Corner awarded to Algeria.
Algeria's Saphir Sliti Taider has run offside.
Sandro Meira Ricci awards Germany a goal kick.
Can Germany get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Algeria's half?
Algeria to take a throw-in in Germany territory.
Sandro Meira Ricci signals a free kick to Germany.
In Porto Alegre Germany drive forward through Bastian Schweinsteiger. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Algeria's Sofiane Feghouli misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball safe as Germany is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Germany awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Algeria at Estadio Beira-Rio.
Algeria's Islam Slimani is whistled for offside at Estadio Beira-Rio.
Germany have a goal kick.
Faouzi Ghoulam for Algeria gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Algeria goal kick.
Throw-in for Algeria in their own half.

Throw-in Germany.
Germany attack but Thomas Muller's header doesn't find the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Algeria goal kick.
Mesut Ozil gets his shot on target but fails to score for Germany.
Germany have been awarded a corner by Sandro Meira Ricci.

Important block from the Algeria defence as Philipp Lahm fires in a strike for Germany.
Algeria are in shooting range from this free kick.
Sofiane Feghouli of Algeria gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for Germany at Estadio Beira-Rio.
In Porto Alegre Algeria's El Arabi Soudani is caught offside.
Thomas Muller (Germany) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
Sandro Meira Ricci awards Algeria a goal kick.
Sandro Meira Ricci signals a free kick to Algeria in their own half.
Germany have a goal kick.
Can Germany get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Algeria's half?
Ball goes out of play for a Algeria goal kick.
Germany push forward through Mesut Ozil, whose finish on goal is saved.
Germany to take a throw-in in Algeria territory.
Algeria awarded a free kick in their own half.
Sandro Meira Ricci signals a throw-in for Algeria, close to Germany's area.
In Porto Alegre, Mehdi Mostefa of Algeria is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Corner awarded to Algeria.
Can Germany capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Algeria's half?
Toni Kroos for Germany drives towards goal at Estadio Beira-Rio. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Mario Gotze of Germany smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Free kick Germany.
Rafik Halliche (Algeria) has received a first yellow card.
Germany are coming forward and Toni Kroos gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for Algeria at Estadio Beira-Rio.
Germany awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick Algeria.
Throw-in for Germany at Estadio Beira-Rio.
The fourth official's board shows 1 minutes, which will be added to the first half.
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
Andre Schurrle is replacing Mario Gotze for Germany at Estadio Beira-Rio.
Germany push forward at Estadio Beira-Rio and Andre Schurrle gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Algeria defence.
Germany have been awarded a corner by Sandro Meira Ricci.
Sandro Meira Ricci signals a Algeria throw-in in Germany's half.
Germany push upfield and Shkodran Mustafi gets his head to the ball. The attempt is cleared by an alert Algeria defence.
Sandro Meira Ricci signals a free kick to Algeria.
Corner awarded to Germany.
Algeria drive upfield and El Arabi Soudani gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Germany defender.
Throw-in Germany.
Sandro Meira Ricci signals a free kick to Germany in their own half.
Sandro Meira Ricci signals a free kick to Algeria in their own half.
Sandro Meira Ricci signals a Algeria throw-in in Germany's half.
Philipp Lahm (Germany) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.

Sandro Meira Ricci blows against Germany's Mesut Ozil for offside.
Germany awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ball safe as Germany is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Germany's Andre Schurrle breaks free at Estadio Beira-Rio. But the strike goes wide of the post.

Corner awarded to Germany.

Can Germany get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Algeria's half?
Free kick Germany.

Ball safe as Algeria is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in Germany.

Throw-in for Algeria close to the penalty box.
Germany to take a throw-in in Algeria territory.
Sandro Meira Ricci signals a free kick to Germany.
Algeria awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick Algeria.
Shkodran Mustafi is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
The match is underway again.
Algeria to take a throw-in in Germany territory.
Throw-in for Germany in their own half.
Shkodran Mustafi, who was grimacing earlier, has been substituted. Sami Khedira is the substitute for Germany.
Germany needs to be cautious. Algeria have an attacking throw-in.
Sandro Meira Ricci signals a free kick to Germany.
Germany's Andre Schurrle gets in a shot on goal at Estadio Beira-Rio. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Can Algeria get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Germany's half?
Algeria are pushing forward but Sofiane Feghouli's finish is wide of the goal.
Sandro Meira Ricci awards Germany a goal kick.
Algeria's Islam Slimani gets in a shot on goal at Estadio Beira-Rio. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Algeria have a dangerous throw-in.
Throw-in Algeria.
Germany awarded a free kick in their own half.
Vahid Halilhodzic (Algeria) is making a first substitution, with Yacine Brahimi replacing Saphir Sliti Taider.
Germany's Bastian Schweinsteiger attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Algeria goal kick.
Throw-in for Germany in their own half.
Thomas Muller for Germany drives towards goal at Estadio Beira-Rio. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Germany's Andre Schurrle is on target but unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Germany.
Sandro Meira Ricci signals a Algeria throw-in in Germany's half.
Germany's Thomas Muller gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Algeria have a goal kick.
Germany awarded a free kick in their own half.
Germany awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Attention is being given to Algeria’s Rafik Halliche and play has been suspended briefly.
The match at Estadio Beira-Rio is underway again.
Free kick in a good position for Germany!
Germany have been awarded a corner by Sandro Meira Ricci.
Rafik Halliche is back on his feet again.
Thomas Muller of Germany is pulled up for offside.
Free kick Germany.
Sandro Meira Ricci signals a throw-in for Algeria, close to Germany's area.
Bastian Schweinsteiger (Germany) goes close with a header but the ball is scrambled away by Algeria defenders.
Goal kick for Algeria at Estadio Beira-Rio.
4 minutes of injury time will be added to the second half.
Germany to take a throw-in in Algeria territory.
Sandro Meira Ricci signals a free kick to Germany in their own half.
Goal kick for Algeria at Estadio Beira-Rio.
Germany have been awarded a corner by Sandro Meira Ricci.
It's 0-0 at the end of normal time.
The first extra period is now underway.
That's a fine assist from Thomas Muller.
Ball safe as Germany is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Sandro Meira Ricci signals a free kick to Germany in their own half.
Throw-in for Germany at Estadio Beira-Rio.
Ball safe as Algeria is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Sandro Meira Ricci signals a Germany throw-in in Algeria's half.
Thomas Muller (Germany) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Rafik Halliche is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Madjid Bougherra (Algeria) has replaced the possibly injured Rafik Halliche at Estadio Beira-Rio.
Play has been resumed.
Germany have a goal kick.
Germany are coming forward and Thomas Muller gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Sandro Meira Ricci awards Algeria a goal kick.
Throw-in for Algeria at Estadio Beira-Rio.
Algeria make their third substitution with Abdelmoumene Djabou replacing El Arabi Soudani.

Corner awarded to Algeria.
Algeria awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Porto Alegre Algeria attack through Mehdi Mostefa. The finish is off target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Germany goal kick.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Bastian Schweinsteiger.
Germany have been awarded a corner by Sandro Meira Ricci.
The match in Porto Alegre is underway once more.
Throw-in for Algeria in their own half.
Bastian Schweinsteiger has recovered and rejoins the match in Porto Alegre.
Algeria have a goal kick.
The first half is prolonged by 1 minutes of added time.
It's 1-0 at the end of the first period.
The second extra period is just kicking-off.
Sandro Meira Ricci signals a free kick to Algeria just outside Germany's area.
Philipp Lahm (Germany) has received a yellow card from Sandro Meira Ricci.
The match at Estadio Beira-Rio has been interrupted briefly for a check on Bastian Schweinsteiger, who is down injured.
Sandro Meira Ricci has blown to resume play in Porto Alegre.
Christoph Kramer (Germany) has replaced the possibly injured Bastian Schweinsteiger.
Germany to take a throw-in in Algeria territory.
Algeria's Abdelmoumene Djabou has run offside.

Germany drive forward and Christoph Kramer gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Germany have a dangerous throw-in.

Goal! Mesut Ozil extends Germany's lead to 2-0.

Sofiane Feghouli with an assist there.
It's 2-1 at the end of extra-time.
